name: Happy
content: 快点出来晃 快点出来逛
我的朋友一秒也别怀疑
不管多懒散 带着你的 fun
一定要让自己 high 翻自己
我说 no no baby baby no no baby baby
再打哈欠就该撞墙壁
No no baby baby no no baby baby
这样 funny 还提不起劲
Pearl and nina glory and debbie
Way and bin and rio baby
这样 happy 的就过了一天
这样 happy 的就玩了一天
这样 happy 的就忘了一天
这样 happy 的就笑了一天
这样 happy 就这么 happy
这样 happy 这么 happy
这样 happy 就这么 happy
这样 happy 一直要这么 happy
Pearl and nina glory and debbie
Way and bin and rio baby
Closest friends can see
The bad stuff we don't need
So it's up to you and me
If you try to give a smile
After a while it becomes your style
If you look inside
Everything's gonna be alright
Everything's gonna be alright

For vengeance fortune or fame
Hold on to your childhood
But be a grown up
Don't be scared to dance
Let go hey yo and turn the music up
